snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins have fired Coach Dan Bylsma and hired Jim Rutherford as their new general manager.
abstract: Pittsburgh Penguins fire coach Dan Bylsma and hire Jim Rutherford as new general manager.
lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins have fired Coach Dan Bylsma and hired Jim Rutherford as their new general manager.

headline.main: Penguins Hire G.M. and Fire Coach
headline.print_headline: Penguins Hire G.M. and Fire Coach
